metrics.title: Portfolio Rating
metrics.calmarRatioTooltip: Calmar Ratio — measures risk-adjusted return by dividing annualized return by maximum drawdown. Higher is better; >3 is excellent, >1 is acceptable.
metrics.sharpeRatioTooltip: Risk-adjusted return — measures excess return per unit of total risk (volatility). Higher is better; >1 is good, >2 is very good.
metrics.betaTooltip: Systematic risk — measures portfolio volatility relative to the market (S&P 500). Beta 1 = same as market, <1 = less volatile, >1 = more volatile.
metrics.alphaTooltip: Excess return — measures portfolio performance beyond what is expected given its risk level (beta). Positive alpha means outperformance.
metrics.sortinoRatioTooltip: Downside risk-adjusted return — similar to Sharpe but only penalizes downside volatility. Higher is better; >1 is good, >2 is very good.
metrics.treynorRatioTooltip: Systematic risk-adjusted return — measures excess return per unit of systematic risk (beta). Higher is better.

auth.authError: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.emailExists: An account with this email already exists.
auth.weakPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.dbError: Database setup error. Please verify the SQL schema was run in Supabase.

profile.tip_marketCap: Total market value of all outstanding shares. Calculated as share price × shares outstanding.
profile.tip_pe: Price-to-Earnings ratio — how much investors pay per $1 of earnings. Lower may indicate undervaluation; typical range 15–25.
profile.tip_forwardPE: P/E based on projected future earnings. Lower than trailing P/E suggests expected earnings growth.
profile.tip_peg: P/E divided by earnings growth rate. PEG < 1 may indicate undervaluation relative to growth.
profile.tip_pb: Price-to-Book — compares market price to book value. Below 1 may indicate undervaluation.
profile.tip_eps: Earnings Per Share — net profit divided by shares outstanding. Higher EPS means more profit per share.
profile.tip_forwardEps: Projected EPS for next 12 months based on analyst estimates.
profile.tip_beta: Measures stock volatility vs. the market. Beta 1 = market average, >1 = more volatile, <1 = less volatile.
profile.tip_divYield: Annual dividend as a percentage of share price. Shows income return on investment.
profile.tip_volume: Average number of shares traded daily. Higher volume means better liquidity.
profile.tip_sma50: 50-day Simple Moving Average — short-term price trend. Price above SMA50 suggests upward momentum.
profile.tip_sma200: 200-day Simple Moving Average — long-term price trend. Price above SMA200 suggests long-term bullish trend.
profile.tip_revenue: Total income from sales before expenses. Also known as top-line.
profile.tip_revenueGrowth: Year-over-year percentage change in revenue. Positive growth indicates expanding business.
profile.tip_grossMargin: Revenue minus cost of goods sold, as % of revenue. Higher margin means more efficient production.
profile.tip_profitMargin: Net income as % of revenue. Shows how much of each dollar in revenue becomes profit.
profile.tip_roe: Return on Equity — net income / shareholders' equity. Measures how efficiently equity is used. >15% is generally good.
profile.tip_roa: Return on Assets — net income / total assets. Measures how efficiently assets are used. >5% is generally good.
profile.tip_fcf: Cash from operations minus capital expenditures. Positive FCF means the company generates cash after investments.
profile.tip_debtEquity: Total debt / shareholders' equity. Higher ratio means more leverage. Below 1 is generally conservative.

markets.title: Markets
markets.noDataAvailable: No data available for this index
markets.tip_24h: Price change in the last 24 hours compared to the previous close.
